papers.title: Governance in Open Source Software Development: The Apache Web Server Project
papers.authors: Mockus, A., Fielding, R. T., et al.
papers.relevance: Documents the meritocratic promotion process where increased competition among experienced contributors naturally regulates advancement rates

semantic_scholar_match.title: Source Software Development : The Apache Server

citations.reasoning: Research on OSS governance and quality control demonstrates natural regulatory mechanisms that slow promotion rates as experienced contributor pools expand, preventing unchecked growth.
